title: Is it possible to download music from iTunes without having to pay for it? - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: There are new free tracks offered on iTunes each week. Also, if you visit Starbucks, each week for the past several years there has been available on the counter a card with a redemption code for a musical track, app, book, TV show, etc.; but mostly music.
